metadata.description: Shaggy, Scooby, Fred, Daphne, and Velma are back, ready to solve strange cases, unmask dastardly villains, and, in Shaggy and Scooby's case, find as many reasons as possible to chow down on some food and get a taste of some Scooby Snacks! Hop in the Mystery Machine and get ready for adventure because the gang is back in business!
metadata.name: Scooby-Doo
